name: B Horizon
description:
In this choose your own adventure style game, you play as a student at the University of Anthropology summer archaeological field school. You and your crew mates must make decisions on where to dig and how to spend your time investigating the survey area. Along the way, you will learn a thing or two about how archaeology is done in North America,  and maybe find a few artifacts.

100% of proceeds will be donated to the Ohio Archaeological Council and Stewards of Historical Preservation. Both are Ohio based 501c3 non-profits that promote the education and preservation of archaeological sites.
